alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 29 at 8:16PM CDT until October 29 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Wayne County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 816 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near State Line, or 14 miles west of Chatom, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Millry and Buckatunna. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
